description.value:
The cockpit is the control center where the operators reside. Cockpit system failure doesn’t directly impede the mech but instead threatens one or more operators.

When the cockpit gains the inoperable condition, each of the operators takes [[/r 1d8+@details.cr]]{1d8 × the mech’s tier} bludgeoning damage; they can attempt a @Check[type:reflex] saving throw to halve the damage (DC = [[15+@details.cr]] 15 + half the mech’s tier). In addition, the operators’ controls become unreliable; the first time each turn that an operator uses a full action to pilot the mech, there’s a [[/r 1d100]] 50% chance that the mech doesn’t gain an action. Either effect lasts until the beginning of the mech’s next turn.
